** whitespaces are compressed, comments are discarded
.
three
\par
% comment

paragraphs
    \par\par
    % comment
 separated by par.

   this     paragraph  has a 	    few 
 words,   including
 % comment
 a comment.


 % spaces at the end
 
.
<div class="body">
<p>three</p><p>paragraphs</p><p>separated by par.</p>
<p>this paragraph has a few words, including a comment.</p>
</div>
.


** how to force two paragraphs
.
text  \par
~
\par
more text
.
<div class="body">
<p>text</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>more text</p>
</div>
.


** standard double-newline paragraph separation (with OSX and Windows EOL support)
.
firstparagraph

 second
paragraph
.
<div class="body">
<p>ﬁrst paragraph</p>
<p>second paragraph</p>
</div>
.


** \\ and \newline do not add spaces (they \unskip)
.
first line \\
 second line

first line \newline
 second line
.
<div class="body">
<p>ﬁrst line<br>second line</p>
<p>ﬁrst line<br>second line</p>
</div>
.


!** \mbox: restricted horizontal mode and linebreaks and paragraphs
.
x\mbox{
one \gobbleO space,
two \gobbleO[] spaces,
two \gobbleO{} spaces,

no wh \\[4cm]ite \newline sp \\ ace,

one \\[4cm] space,
one \linebreak[4]space,
one \linebreak[4] space,

xx\par

{xx \\  x}}x

\mbox{ there
is

a


space at the beginning and two at the end } .
.
<div class="body">
<p>x<span class="hbox"><span>​ one space, two ​ spaces, two ​ spaces, no whitespace, one space, one space, one space, xxxxx</span></span>x</p>
<p><span class="hbox"><span> there is a space at the beginning and two at the end </span></span> .</p>
</div>
.


!** \unskip breaks out of groups, \ignorespaces does not
.
text {\unskip} text, text {\ignorespaces} text,
.
<div class="body">
<p>text text, text  text</p>
</div>
.



!** a space is added after macros that take arguments
.
% TODO: add a brsp after ] and }
one \gobbleO space,
two \gobbleO[] spaces,
two \gobbleO{} spaces,
two \echoOGO{} spaces,
two \echoO[] spaces.
.
<div class="body">
<p>one space, two ​ spaces, two ​ spaces.</p>
</div>
.



!** space hack to prevent multiple spaces
.
x \pagebreak x \nopagebreak x \vspace{1mm} x \label{hi} x \marginpar{test} x \index{something} x \glossary{word} x \nocite x \enlargethispage x
.
<div class="body">
<p>x x x x x x x x x x</p>
</div>
.


** more than two newlines, including spaces, equal two newlines
.
first paragraph

   
  


second paragraph
.
<div class="body">
<p>ﬁrst paragraph</p>
<p>second paragraph</p>
</div>
.


** comments are disregarded and won't add a paragraph
.
first paragraph


  % this should not cause another paragraph


second paragraph
.
<div class="body">
<p>ﬁrst paragraph</p>
<p>second paragraph</p>
</div>
.

** comments are disregarded and won't prevent a paragraph
.
first paragraph % this should not prevent the paragraph

second paragraph% this should not prevent the paragraph

third paragraph
.
<div class="body">
<p>ﬁrst paragraph</p>
<p>second paragraph</p>
<p>third paragraph</p>
</div>
.


** comments can remove a linebreak (i.e. space) and thus join lines
.
This is an % stupid
% Better: instructive <----
example: Supercal%
              ifragilist%
    icexpialidocious
.
<div class="body">
<p>This is an example: Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious</p>
</div>
.



** one space inside as well as after a group is kept, the rest is compressed or skipped
.
text with empty group {  } and more text

text with {a group} and more text

text with { a group } and more text

text with { a group  } and more text

text with {  a group  }  and more text
.
<div class="body">
<p>text with empty group ​ ​ and more text</p>
<p>text with a group​ and more text</p>
<p>text with ​ a group ​ and more text</p>
<p>text with ​ a group ​ and more text</p>
<p>text with ​ a group ​ and more text</p>
</div>
.


** macros without arguments ignore spaces afterwards
.
some \empty  text.
.
<div class="body">
<p>some text.</p>
</div>
.


** force a space after a macro with {}
.
some \empty{} text.
.
<div class="body">
<p>some ​ text.</p>
</div>
.


** force a space after a macro with \
.
some \empty\ text.
.
<div class="body">
<p>some ​ text.</p>
</div>
.


** \ followed by tab or linebreak is also a space
.
some \empty\
text. And\	these
\
are spaces, but not\

this.
.
<div class="body">
<p>some ​ text. And​ these ​ are spaces, but not​ </p>
<p>this.</p>
</div>
.


** escaped newlines in an empty document (or at the end of a document)
.
\


.
<div class="body">
<p>​ </p>
</div>
.


** escaped newlines at the start of a paragraph
.
\
x

.
<div class="body">
<p>​ x</p>
</div>
.


** escaped newlines after an environment
.
\begin{center}
\end{center}
\

.
<div class="body">
<div class="list center"></div>
<p class="continue">​ </p>
</div>
.


** spaces before and after horizontal environments
.
xx
\begin{empty}
  text\begin{empty}
    text
  \end{empty}
  \begin{empty}text
  \end{empty}
\end{empty}
xx
.
<div class="body">
<p>xx ​ text​ text ​ text ​ ​ xx</p>
</div>
.
